Package hapi.release

Provides generated classes and interfaces for the release-related aspects of communicating with Helm's server-side Tiller component from Java.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HookOuterClass.HookOrBuilder  
    InfoOuterClass.InfoOrBuilder  
    ReleaseOuterClass.ReleaseOrBuilder  
    StatusOuterClass.StatusOrBuilder  
    TestRunOuterClass.TestRunOrBuilder  
    TestSuiteOuterClass.TestSuiteOrBuilder  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HookOuterClass  
    HookOuterClass.Hook
    Hook defines a hook object.
    HookOuterClass.Hook.Builder
    Hook defines a hook object.
    InfoOuterClass  
    InfoOuterClass.Info
    Info describes release information.
    InfoOuterClass.Info.Builder
    Info describes release information.
    ReleaseOuterClass  
    ReleaseOuterClass.Release
    Release describes a deployment of a chart, together with the chart and the variables used to deploy that chart.
    ReleaseOuterClass.Release.Builder
    Release describes a deployment of a chart, together with the chart and the variables used to deploy that chart.
    StatusOuterClass  
    StatusOuterClass.Status
    Status defines the status of a release.
    StatusOuterClass.Status.Builder
    Status defines the status of a release.

    TestRunOuterClass.TestRun.Builder

    TestSuiteOuterClass  
    TestSuiteOuterClass.TestSuite
    TestSuite comprises of the last run of the pre-defined test suite of a release version
    TestSuiteOuterClass.TestSuite.Builder
    TestSuite comprises of the last run of the pre-defined test suite of a release version

Package hapi.release Description

Provides generated classes and interfaces for the release-related aspects of communicating with Helm's server-side Tiller component from Java.

Documentation of the classes and interfaces in this package is authored by the Kubernetes Helm team.

Author:
The Kubernetes Helm team
